page.title: 05Events in Swindon, 1985
page.content: {The Football Club.} The town was stunned when its popular soccer manager, Lou Macari was suddenly dismissed. In just one year he had injected enthusiasm and hope for the future,and had begun to build up an exciting team. Within days, by public demand he was re-instated. He said"I wish it had never happened but it is good to know that a stranger coming to this town can have so many friends". The club is also in financial trouble over rent arrears owing on the stand which was built in 1973 when the club was in the Second division. An appeal has been set up and a deal is being negotiated with the local Council.
